description.value:
A phrase of luck is carved into the handle of this wooden ladle. While a variety of other cutlery with similar properties exists, a spoon is often the most convenient and inconspicuous to carry.

Activate - Purify 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You stir the spoon in food or drink, casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cleanse Cuisine] on the substance as you stir. This spoon is perfect for pouring heartwarming meals into bowls. It can purify up to 16 gallons of food or drink.
